TopicTitle: The Long March (bad name, great great rocket)

Articles.Content:
This is what I belive my best Rocket ever created. Stable, nice looking, advanced steps..brilliant.

Please take it for a spin. I have plenty of mods attached to it. Can\'t name them all.

1: There is no way the lander legs can support that weight from the heavy-as-kuck fuel tank / 'too many mods to list them all' - spec. change excuse? xD

2: C7\'s mini-fuel tanks = soooo OP

but cool design... Who made those tri-couplers?

Hello!

Blame the crew, who want to run out of fuel?

Those legs jettison at start, if you wait to long it sometimes collapses but once in flight, it\'s a beuty

About them mods, I think I have more or less all of them. My parts folder take up 434 mb

Cheers!

Glad you liked it.
